attributes.additional_details:
Weight votes at general and local elections proportionalty using the following schema;

1 vote from council tax band H & I resident = 1 vote
1 vote from council tax band G resident = 2 votes
1 vote from council tax band F resident = 3 votes
1 vote from council tax band E resident = 4 votes
1 vote from council tax band D resident = 5 votes
1 vote from council tax band C resident = 6 votes
1 vote from council tax band B resident = 7 votes
1 vote from council tax band A resident = 8 votes

or a weighted schema simular in principle.
